name: Kurochan Quest RPG
description:
This game is a small RPG Game Project that I made to showcase the RPG Maker MZ Plugins my friend, SirLegna, has released via his Plugin Generator Tool's catalog of plugins. (The Plugin Generator Tool can be found HERE.) 

I plan to add to this project as SirLegna adds more plugins to his Gen Tool's catalog, so the two of us hope you enjoy this ongoing project and find some inspiration from what I've built to make your RPG Maker MZ games even more epic with SirLegna's plugins!

SirLegna Links:

  • SirLegna's itch page: Visit Here
  • SirLegna's Plugin Generator Tool page: Visit Here

Your donations support my game dev work & make it possible for me to keep releasing new awesome content!
